Light_Control_On_Off.title: On/Off
Light_Control_On_Off.description: On/off control. Boolean value where True is On and False is Off.

Light_Control_Dimmer.title: Dimmer
Light_Control_Dimmer.description: This resource represents a dimmer setting, which has an Integer value between 0 and 100 as a percentage.

Light_Control_On_time.title: On time
Light_Control_On_time.description: The time in seconds that the device has been on. Writing a value of 0 resets the counter.

Light_Control_Cumulative_active_power.title: Cumulative active power
Light_Control_Cumulative_active_power.description: The cumulative active power since the last cumulative energy reset or device start.

Light_Control_Power_factor.title: Power factor
Light_Control_Power_factor.description: If applicable, the power factor of the current consumption.

Light_Control_Colour.title: Colour
Light_Control_Colour.description: A string representing a value in some color space.

Light_Control_Application_Type.title: Application Type
Light_Control_Application_Type.description: The application type of the sensor or actuator as a string depending on the use case.
